kingpin.title: Kingpin Underworld
kingpin.description: A mobile RPG game made with C++ and IUGO's game engine, Connexion. With online PVP raids, campaign story, and character collection.

aura.title: Aura
aura.description: An RPG project made in Unreal Engine 5, with C++ and Blueprints, using Unreal's Gameplay Ability System plugin.
